message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 70%, you take 30%.
Let's be fair, Alice. This is a good deal while the money is still worth a lot.
The value is dropping fast, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers, but this is my final offer.
Okay, Alice, one last offer.  It's clear we both want a bigger share, so let's split the difference from our previous offers. This is the best I can do with the value dropping so fast.
